featured_brands.rationale: Newer UK-focused operator with strong sports coverage. Represents genuine 'new' entry to market with UKGC license. Modern interface appeals to mobile-first bettors.
featured_brands.unique_angle: UK market specialist with comprehensive football coverage

featured_brands.rationale: Casino-sportsbook hybrid offering differentiated experience. New operator with gamification features. Appeals to younger demographic seeking entertainment beyond traditional betting.
Featured on competing affiliate sites, indicating market presence. Clean brand identity. Focus on core sports betting without overwhelming users.
Established international operator with UK expansion. Represents 'new to UK market' angle. Extensive sports coverage (30+ sports) brings innovation to UK market.
featured_brands.unique_angle: International expertise with massive sports selection

featured_brands.rationale: Premium positioning suggests targeting higher-value bettors. New operator with elevated brand identity. May offer higher limits and VIP treatment for serious punters.
featured_brands.unique_angle: Premium betting experience with elevated limits

featured_brands.rationale: Unique brand name suggests multi-faceted platform. New operator bringing fresh approach. Name implies variety and choice, appealing to diverse betting interests.
featured_brands.unique_angle: Multi-sport platform with diverse betting options

featured_brands.rationale: Name suggests mobile-first positioning ('Mogo' = Mobile Go). New operator built for smartphone generation. Likely optimized for app-based betting experience.
featured_brands.unique_angle: Mobile-first operator designed for on-the-go betting
